name: Modern Feedly
description:
Better Feedly is a modified version of "Feedly Wide Pure" and "Feedly Un-Pro", which allows for the best of both worlds. Left-justified, wider articles, and eliminates the Pro/Upgrade crap.

https://userstyles.org/styles/146668/feedly-wide-pure

https://userstyles.org/styles/118803/feedly-un-pro

I am not trying to steal anyone's hard work, just capitalizing on the great work.
